sentence.value: He was appointed Chief of the Shuttle Training Aircraft Operations Office in January 1976 with responsibility for the operational use of the shuttle trainer, and held that position until being selected as an astronaut candidate by NASA in January 1978.

sentence.value: In August 1979, he completed a one-year training and evaluation period and became eligible for Space Shuttle flight crew assignment.
sentence.annotated-sentence: In [[August 1979|1979]], he completed a one-year [[training|Training]] and [[evaluation|Evaluation]] period and became eligible for [[Space|Space]] [[Shuttle|Shuttle_(video_game)]] [[flight|Flight_simulator]] crew assignment.
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: In August 1979, he completed a one-year training and evaluation period and became eligible for Space [[Shuttle|Shuttle_(video_game)]] [[flight|Flight_simulator]] crew assignment.

sentence.value: From 1979 to 1983, Griggs was involved in several Space Shuttle engineering capacities including the development and testing of the Head-Up Display (HUD) approach and landing avionics system, development of the Manned Maneuvering Unit (MMU), and the requirements definition and verification of on-orbit rendezvous and entry flight phase software and procedures.
sentence.annotated-sentence: null
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: null

sentence.value: In September 1983 he began crew training as a mission specialist for flight STS-51-D, which flew April 12–19, 1985.
sentence.annotated-sentence: In [[September 1983|1983]] he began crew [[training|Training]] as [[a mission specialist|Mission_Specialist]] for [[flight|Flight]] [[STS-51-D|STS-51-D]], which flew [[April 12|April_12]]–19, [[1985|1985]].
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: In September 1983 he began crew training as a mission specialist for flight [[STS-51-D|STS-51-D]], which flew April 12–19, 1985.

sentence.value: During the flight, Mr. Griggs conducted the first unscheduled extravehicular activity (space walk) of the space program.
sentence.annotated-sentence: During [[the flight|Darts]], Mr. Griggs conducted the first unscheduled [[extravehicular activity|Extra-vehicular_activity]] ([[space walk|Extra-vehicular_activity]]) of the space program.
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: During the flight, Mr. Griggs conducted the first unscheduled extravehicular activity (space walk) of the space program.

sentence.value: The space walk lasted for over three hours during which preparations for a satellite rescue attempt were completed.
sentence.annotated-sentence: The [[space walk|Extra-vehicular_activity]] lasted for over [[three hours|Three_Hours]] during which preparations for a [[satellite|Satellite]] rescue [[attempt|Attempt]] were completed.
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: The space walk lasted for over three hours during which preparations for a satellite rescue attempt were completed.

sentence.value: At the time of his death, Griggs was in flight crew training as pilot for STS-33, a dedicated Department of Defense mission, scheduled for launch in November 1989.
sentence.annotated-sentence: null
